chunks.zh: [送兑换码] 一个 macOS 平台的一键翻译软件，无联网权限，大小不到 1M
chunks.en: [Sending Redemption Codes] A one-click translation software for macOS, no internet access required, and less than 1MB in size.

chunks.zh: 最近写了个小软件，用来实现：划线选中句子后，使用自定义的一个快捷键来触发翻译。
chunks.en: Recently, I wrote a small piece of software to achieve this: after selecting a sentence with a line, use a custom shortcut key to trigger the translation.

chunks.zh: 特点：上架了 Mac App Store ；无联网权限保护隐私。
chunks.en: Features: Listed on the Mac App Store; no internet access required to protect privacy.

chunks.zh: 原理：通过调用快捷指令借用 macOS 自带的翻译来实现。
chunks.en: Principle: Implemented by calling shortcut commands to borrow macOS's built-in translation function.

chunks.zh: 上架审核花了好多时间，踩了不少坑。
chunks.en: It took a lot of time to get it approved and listed, and I encountered many pitfalls.

chunks.zh: Mac App Store:  https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/id6738653169
chunks.en: Mac App Store:  https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/id6738653169

chunks.zh: 老规矩，上兑换码, 分批上，第一批 50 个：(尽量按序 使用了的还麻烦留言一下 方便后来者 谢谢)
chunks.en: As usual, here are the redemption codes, released in batches, the first batch of 50: (Please leave a message if you have used them in order to help others, thank you)

chunks.zh: @lihaokey 打开 Mac App Store -> 左下角点击昵称（登录后）-> 右上角点击兑换充值卡 -> 输入代码
chunks.en: @lihaokey Open Mac App Store -> Click nickname in the lower left corner (after logging in) -> Click Redeem Gift Card in the upper right corner -> Enter code

chunks.zh: 给楼主提个建议，深色模式的 ui 适配问题
chunks.en: A suggestion for the owner: the UI adaptation issue in dark mode.

chunks.zh: 感觉有个 bug 。在外接显示器上任何应用软件上都不会弹出翻译结果框（笔记本主屏上正常） mbp m1 pro:15.0.1 (24A348)
chunks.en: I feel there is a bug. The translation result box does not pop up on any application software on the external monitor (the notebook's main screen is normal) mbp m1 pro:15.0.1 (24A348)

chunks.zh: 感觉对于看论文很方便，虽然来晚了但想买入🤔
chunks.en: Feels very convenient for reading papers, although I'm late, I still want to buy it 🤔

chunks.zh: 已买入，支持楼主
chunks.en: Already bought it, supporting the owner.

chunks.zh: 好用, 提个小建议, 能不能支持自动双向翻译, 比如 1. 选中中文句子, 自动翻译为英文. 选中英文句子, 自动翻译为中文.
chunks.en: Easy to use, a small suggestion, can you support automatic bidirectional translation, such as 1. Select a Chinese sentence and automatically translate it into English. Select an English sentence and automatically translate it into Chinese.

chunks.zh: 总是来晚，于是我买了一个，🐶，祝楼主大卖！！早日变自由职业者。
chunks.en: Always late, so I bought one, 🐶, I wish the owner great sales!! Become a freelancer soon.

chunks.zh: 已经买了 bob 了，祝楼主大卖
chunks.en: Already bought bob, I wish the owner great sales.

chunks.zh: https://imgur.com/a/PuheGCE 这个大小，巨无霸呀
chunks.en: https://imgur.com/a/PuheGCE This size, it's a behemoth.

chunks.zh: @imNull 已更新测试，用起来很舒适，可以方便处理 pdf 翻译。已在 App Store 留好评
chunks.en: @imNull Updated test, it is very comfortable to use, and it can easily handle PDF translation. I have left a good review on the App Store.

chunks.zh: 一下载就提示要付费啊，我是土区的 ID ，你们是怎么做到用码不付费的？
chunks.en: It prompts me to pay as soon as I download it. I am from the Turkey region ID. How do you guys manage to use the code without paying?

chunks.zh: 这，一来就是 14+系统😂
chunks.en: This, it needs 14+ system😂
